User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:6.0.2) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/6.0.2
Build ID: 20110902133214

Steps to reproduce:

I have one IMAP account and multiple SMTP accounts/identities associated with that account.  I deleted the signature for the IMAP account and instead placed it in one of the SMTP identities options.


Actual results:

The signature seems to be synchronized with the default identity - when I delete the signature from the IMAP account, it deletes it from the identity as well.  The same thing happens backwards.


Expected results:

Shouldn't the signatures be for individual SMTP accounts?
